original: 《三國演義》虛構之人物，為曹軍夏侯惇部下。長坂坡之戰時，與其兄鍾縉攔阻趙雲，兩人被剛奪得青釭劍的趙雲擊殺。
text: A fictional character in "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" is a subordinate of Cao Jun and Xiahou Dun. During the Battle of Changbanpo, and his brother Zhong Jin blocked Zhao Yun, the two were killed by Zhao Yun who had just won the Blue Nightmare Sword.
